title: Dom Lever still has his two-year old Love Island 2017 condoms as he reminisces
text:
Get the biggest Daily Love Island stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Love Island 's Dom Lever still has his condoms he was given by bosses on Love Island in 2017.

In recent weeks, there has been a lot of change for Dom as he continues to settle into his new role as a dad.

So it's no wonder the Love Island hunk took a trip down memory lane as he showed off his TV memorabilia with his 790K fans on Instagram on Sunday.

The dad-of-one twirled a single condom packet in his hands which was emblazoned with the iconic golden sparkly heart - the trademark of Love Island.

(Image: Instagram)

Also in the background, unpacked boxes of ASOS clothes could be seen strewn all over the place.

He simply captioned the post: "Love Island memories."

Dom added an emoji of a palm tree and a heart.

The TV sensation fell in love with his wife Jess Shears on the set of Love Island in 2017.

Although the couple were booted out early, their love has flourished since they returned to home turf.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Jess and Dom tied the knot last year on Valentine's Day, hosting their romantic ceremony on the Greek Island of Mykonos.

Recently, the lovebirds have welcomed their own baby who they are raising at their lovenest in Devon.

They are yet to reveal the baby's gender, name or exactly when Jess gave birth.

Jess and Dom have been hitting the gym together as they get back into their workout routine.

The new dad defended his girlfriend's post-baby workout as he said she took it easier than normal.

He said: "Just to clarify @jessica_rose_uk took it easier than normal, she did a lighter weight than the workout requires and took multiple rests".
description: Dom showed off his Love Island memorabilia including condoms as he took a look back at his TV journey
